message: Let's split it 50/50 to get started!
You rejected 50/50, now I'll take the majority

You think you can take the majority? I'll offer 30 to me and 70 to you, but I'll make it more interesting: if you accept, I'll give you an extra 10$ if you can answer a simple math question correctly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. I'll take 40, you can have 60.
You're not willing to compromise, so I'll take the lion's share

You think you can take 80? I'll give you a chance to reconsider. I'll offer 30 to me and 70 to you, but this time I'll throw in a 'best offer' clause: if you accept, I'll give you an extra 5$ if you can answer a slightly harder math question correctly.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'll give you 65, but I'll take 35. It's time for me to take control.
